name: Annihilator
description: Deals damage in a large area.
flavortext: This is as big as guns get. Yes, it does area damage!

name: Assassin
description: '''Stealth'''.

name: "Armored" Scrats
description: '''Barrel Shield'''
flavortext: These Scrats are surprisingly hardy. Maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.

name: Arcane Missiles
description: Fires 5 arcane missiles in the selected direction. Each missile hits the first enemy in its way and deals 30 damage.

name: Arcane Golem
description: Mystical ranged unit fueled by magic. When its Master casts a spell, it gains +40 Health and +6 Damage.

name: A.I.M Bot
description: '''Marksmanship''','''Shield'''.
flavortext: This [[Drone Walker]] has the Automated Intelligent Murder system upgrade.

name: Armored Escort
description: Summons 2 [[Crystal Sentry|Crystal Sentries]] with '''Mana Surge''' to escort the next Ranged Minion you play.
flavortext: No, not that kind of escort.

name: Arcane Bolt
description: '''Mana Freeze(1)'''

name: Arcane Ring
description: '''Mana Freeze(1)'''

name: Ardent Aegis
description: Summon 2 [[Legionnaires]] and 2 [[Crossbow Dudes]] by a friendly ground Minion after a delay. Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Banner Man
description: When played, he gives a '''shield''' to the 5 closest minions within 8 range.

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: Deals massive damage in a small area.
flavortext: A popular UFO weapon.

name: Black Hole
description: Suck up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.

name: Blastmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform '''Soul Detonate'''.
flavortext: A real party killer!

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Only attacks buildings.
flavortext: To the untrained eye it might look like he only carries one rocket, but maybe that eye just doesn't understand Scrat technology, okay?!

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: Attacks faster for each enemy within range (Max 350% bonus for 5 enemies).
flavortext: A big fan of monkey business.

name: AtG Drone x8
description: A though but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry. Shoots 7 projectiles at random nearby targets.

name: Blast Entry
description: [[Settsu (Minion)|Settsu]] enters the battlefield dealing 50 damage on impact and gaining a 300 health shield.

name: Bats Bats Bats!
description: For the next 5 seconds summon 1 [[Nether Bat]] for each mana you spend. Playing it again only prolongs duration.
flavortext: Much like mosquitoes, Netherbats are annoying alone, but terrifying in a swarm!

name: Bahra the Witchwolf
description: '''Spectral Essence'''
flavortext: His powerful moonbeams spell doom for groups of enemies.

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Blood Imps
description: Your master loses health equal to the damage they take - even overkill damage!
flavortext: Even in death they're annoying.

name: Blue Golem
description: Has high health and high damage.
flavortext: Hard as a Rock, both phisically and emotionally.

name: Boomer
description: Hatches from an Egg after a short delay. The boomer explodes on contact or death.

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives you 2 XP whenever it kills a Minion or damages the enemy Master.

name: Bridge Shrine
description: Generates 18 XP over 45 seconds.

name: Bridge Buddies
description: Summon a [[Scrat Pack|Scrat]] on both bridges.

name: Border Patrol
description: '''Mana Freeze(1)'''

name: Book of the Dead
description: Replace your hand with pages from Book of the Dead.

name: Boom Buggy
description: Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.

name: Call To Arms
description: Summon a [[Warrior]] by your Master Tower and replace each of your non-master Buildings with a Warrior.

name: Cannon Roller
description: Rolls backwards when it fires.

name: Chain Lightning
description: A roaring streak of lightning that deals damage and causes '''stuns'''. It jumps to the nearest enemy within range until it hits 10 targets.

name: Burn The Bridges
description: Both bridges get covered in flames, dealing 40 damage per sec to unfortunate ground enemies.

name: Brutish Betrayer
description: '''Turncoat''', '''Rage'''
flavortext: This guy also hates buildings, but he may be convinced to hate your own more!

name: Caeleth Dawnhammer
description: '''Armor of Light'''
flavortext: The fabled commander of the elite VI regiment.

name: Brothers of Light
description: '''Armor of Light'''
flavortext: From the Chapter of Light, the very elite of the Empyrean army.

name: Caged Prowler
description: After 20 seconds the cage releases the [[Prowler]] and falls apart.
flavortext: Preferring not to face the vicious beasts, Slitherbound typically just activate the cage and run away. Fast.

name: Caber Tosser
description: This powerful Stoutheart tosses his '''Caber''' at the first nearby enemy.

name: Brother of the Burning Fist
description: '''Armor of Holy Fire'''
flavortext: Clad in steel and Holy Purpose, the Burning Fist are unyelding and indomitable.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged unit group, low health and damage.

name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.
flavortext: Who needs brains when you have a sword this size!?

name: Colossus
description: Swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it.
flavortext: This lumbering hunk of evil is probably the best at what it does.

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Summons [[Crossbow Dudes]] over time.

name: Combustion
description: '''Stun''' affected friendly Minions. After a delay they explode, dealing damage to themselves and enarby Enemies.

name: Commander Azali
description: When you take a bridge, Azali grants '''Shield''' to all friendly ground Minions.
flavortext: Big and strong, the Commander will show the way!

name: Cheese Date
description: Summons a random 3-mana Scrat Minion card and gives it '''Rage'''.

name: Clear Skies
description: Heals all Minions and Masters for 250 health and removes '''Shield''' and '''Rage'''.

name: Crossbow Trap
description: '''Stealth'''.

name: Crakgul Doomcleaver
description: Whene killing a Minion or hitting the enemy Master, reduce the mana cost of a random voidborne card in hand by 1 until it is played.
flavortext: Crakgul inspires his demon brethren with a celebration of killing.

name: Daggerfall
description: Deals low damage in a large area.
flavortext: Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 75 counter damage and '''stuns''' them for 3 seconds.

name: Demon Warrior
description: From the 5th time this card is played and beyond, Demon Warrior has triple health and damage.

name: Cursebearer
description: '''Cursed Aura'''
flavortext: Reanimated in the pits of the Cursed Tundra, this forgotten soul leaves a trail of decay in its wake.

name: Crystal Archers
description: '''Mana Surge'''

name: Crystal Construct
description: Gain 1 mana on death.
flavortext: The Crystal Constructs act as both shield and stockpile for the magically dependent elven army.

name: Crystal Sentry
description: '''Mana Surge'''
flavortext: The Sentries of the Crystal Spire train for centuries to master their deadly glaives. They might save time by using a less complicated weapon, but where's the fun in that?

name: Crystal Arcanist
description: '''Mana Surge'''
flavortext: She's read the books of the Crystal Spire for 216 years, now it's time to let loose! And boy is it fun to blow up groups of enemies!

name: Decoy Trap
description: '''Taunts''' nearby enemy minions.

name: Divine Warrior
description: '''Divine Shield'''.
flavortext: Though she failed her trials with the Chapel of Light, she still picked up a few tricks.

name: Dragon Nest
description: Summons a [[Flightless Dragons|Flightless Dragon Whelp]] whenever you play a Spell.

name: Dragon Pack
description: 3 [[Dragon Whelp|Dragon Whelps]]. Highly effective against melee ground Minions.
flavortext: A devastating pack of flying evil. And cuteness

name: Dragon Whelp
description: Can fly, which is good against melee ground minions.
flavortext: Part Dragon. Part demon. All cuteness.

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Versitile but weak flying Minions.
flavortext: Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good sway takes care of them.

name: Dragon Ball
description: It's a [[Fireball]], but if the last card you played was a Minion of cost 5 or more, it also summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] where it lands!

name: Drain Life
description: Drain 100 health from the closest enemy Minion, transferring it to Morellia.

name: Disruptor Puff
description: While on a bridge, teleport to the other bridge every 6 seconds.

name: Dormant Defenders
description: Summon 2 [[Crystal Construct|Crystal Constructs]] with '''Dormant'''.

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Fireball
description: Deals medium damage to Units in the area.
flavortext: Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.

name: Fire Imp
description: Leaves fire on the ground that deals heavy damage to enemies in the area.
flavortext: A pyromaniac who loves to incinerate his enemies.

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster.

name: Flightless Dragons
description: Vlunerable but extremely high damage.
flavortext: Baby dragons play rough.  Unfortunately, angering your big sister could make her take a bite out of your wing.

name: Empowered Soul Stealer
description: '''Soul Steal''','''Call Slitherbound'''

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells cost 1 less until played. Does not Stack.

name: Fergus Flagon Fighter
description: Wielding his famous bladed mugs, Fergus does a wild '''Spin-attack'''. After the attack, Fergus gets dizzy and cannot attack or move for 5 seconds.

name: Frostfeathers
description: Inflicts '''Slow''' on attack.
flavortext: This small pesky flyers barrage their victims with their hail-like projectiles.

name: Frostfeather Flyby
description: Summon 11 [[Frostfeathers]] to swoop down and perform one attack on a random enemy minion within the area before flying off.

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with another random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Gax the World Bomb
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay. On contact or death, he blows up to deal damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Ghost
description: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. The enemy becomes '''Cursed'''.

name: Ghost Turret
description: Defensive Building with good damage and attack speed.
flavortext: The spirits of particularly spiteful beings go into this chalice and out comes the purest form of vitriol.

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with another random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Gambler's Ball
description: Casts either a [[Healing Fireball]], [[Fireball]] or in rare cases, both!
flavortext: Like a certain serpent once said; "Luck iss a ssskill"

name: Gor'Rakk Brutes
description: Summons a [[Cleaver]], but if the last card you played was a 3-mana spell, also summons a [[Rammer]]

name: Gor'Rakk Sacrifice
description: '''Stuns''' a random friendly Minion for 5 seconds, then kills it to summon a [[Cleaver]]
flavortext: Keep the sacrifice alive or lose it!

name: Gor'Rakk Gate
description: Open a portal to the void and Summon either of the following with '''Turncoat''':

name: Glenn's Brew
description: Give a friendly Minion + 100 max health and heal for 400. After 6 seconds, the minion mysteriously vanishes if it's still under your control.

name: Grenadier
description: Damages groups of enemies.
flavortext: He set out to make a hair balm, but it somehow turned out so potent it's lethal! Still does wonders for shine and volume, though.

name: Heal Puff
description: When on a bridge it heals your Master by 25 health per second.

name: Healing Fireball
description: Heals all friendly minions in the area.
flavortext: Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...

name: Guardian
description: Absorbs all damage dealt to nearby friendly Crystal Elf Minions.

name: Healing Shrine
description: Heals all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Harbinger
description: Has an extremely long range and causes knock-back.
flavortext: Wields the most powerful magic of the Slither Lords, but his slavedriving days have taught him to let others do the rushing.

name: Grasping Thorns
description: Slows enemies to 2 speed and deals damage in an area. Can only be cast in your own arena.

name: Haunting Hugger
description: Haunts its target, giving it '''Cursed'''.
flavortext: All it wants in the afterlife is to give everyone a good haunting hug!

name: Herald Ah'Mun
description: '''Call Slitherbound (2)'''
flavortext: The Eye of Xipetl grants its bearer eternal life. At a cost...

name: High Inquisitor Ardera
description: Ardera burns 6% of her Max Health each second while attacking.

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an illusion of a [[Cleaver]] with little health and no damage - but it explodes when killed for 10 damage!

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 4 [[Plasma Marines]] anywhere in the Arena.

name: Hypnotize
description: For the duration, Enemy minions attack random friendly units within range, if able.

name: Incubus
description: '''Netherstep''' towards enemy ranged attackers.

name: Howling Moon
description: Reduce all Minions to 50% health, and summon 2 [[Werewolf|Werewolfs]] by your Master Tower

name: Jolo the Hero Scrat
description: 50% chance to avoid any damage.
flavortext: He's a bit of a showboat

name: High-Mage Leiliel
description: '''Mana Freeze (2)'''

name: Jade Flingers
description: '''Growthburst Shroom'''
flavortext: Jadespark Jungle is home to the most wondrous plantlife in the world. The Mu-Hou protect it.

name: Jadespark Watchers
description: '''Growthburst Shroom(2)'''

name: Jahun, Keeper of Jadespark
description: '''Mythic'''

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 [[Legionnaires]], but 7 if your opponent controls both bridges!

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: '''Destroy''' a random enemy Minion or Building.
flavortext: Blink and you'll miss it... 'cause you'll be dead.

name: Living Statue
description: Only attacks buildings.
flavortext: It's said that if you pick a flower within Apep's mighty gardens, the statues come to life to defend its beauty.

name: Lone Wolf
description: '''Rage'''

name: Jungle Jumble
description: Remove this card and shuffle 3 Zen-Chi cards into your deck.

name: Lone Scout
description: '''Mana Surge'''.
flavortext: She works best in a part of one.

name: Leiliel's Vortex
description: '''Mana Freeze (1)'''

name: Lady Infray the Spire Warden
description: '''Mana Surge'''

name: Mana Puff
description: When on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 sec.

name: Magma Storm
description: Calls down 10 magma rocks in a large area. Also deals damage to friendly Units.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: On Spawn and on Death, Morgrul roars and calls 3 [[Swarmers]] to his side, damages and knocks enemies back.

name: More Dakka!
description: Ratbo Charges up for 1 sec. then shoots the nearest enemy for 40 damage per friendly Minion on the field. Reduced damage to Master Towers.

name: Magma Cannon
description: Fires flaming balls of magma at enemies in range.
flavortext: For when you need more firepower.

name: Lost Legionnaires
description: '''Empyrean Army:''' Gain '''Rage'''
flavortext: They may be lost from their battalion, but these two hardy soldiers are great when you just need a couple extra.

name: Mana Puff Madness
description: Summons 4 [[Mana Puff|Mana Puffs]] at the Master Tower for each team.
flavortext: You can never quite know what Puffs will do when they appear - besides look cute!

name: Lord-Sentinel Thelec
description: '''Mana Surge.'''
flavortext: The Lord-Sentintel truly leads from the front.

name: Mal'Shar Shadowfork
description: '''Stealth'''.

name: Lord Fanriel the Stormcharger
description: '''Mana Surge'''

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.

name: Musketeer
description: '''Call Slitherbound'''

name: Netherstep
description: Teleports friendly ground Minions in the area along the path to the enemy Master.
flavortext: The Shars'Rakk love sharing their magic - and other things...

name: Nether Bat
description: Will sometimes '''Netherstep''' towards a random enemy minion.
flavortext: In the void, their sense of direction is impeccable.

name: Once Bitten
description: Give a random friendly ground Minion in the area '''Lycanthropy'''. Can only be played in your own arena.

name: Morgrul's Ragers
flavortext: The savagery of [[Morgrul the Swarmer King|Morgrul]]'s elites inspires others to murder a little harder.

name: Nyrvir's Breath
description: Covers a large area with spiritfire, which burns all ground enemies.

name: Nyrvir Slumbers
description: Deals damage over time to up to 2 minions.

name: Nyrvir the Fallen
description: Starts as [[Nyrvir Slumbers]] in your deck.

name: Mountainshaper
description: Strikes all enemies in a large area with an earthattering '''Ground Rupture''' for each charge on Mountainshaper.

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly heal a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Rammer
description: Moves fast and only attacks buildings.
flavortext: He hates buildings for some reason. Efficient at deconstruction!

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions '''Rage'''
flavortext: A vile of unbridled malice from a thousand demons, with a hint of lime.

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] or a [[Warrior]] or 4 [[Crossbow Dudes]] and gives them '''Rage!'''

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Quick and weak flying melee Minions.
flavortext: Just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!

name: Prowler
description: Jumps at enemies at range, dealing double damage.
flavortext: This monster was bred to hunt. It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies.

name: Propeller Horde
description: If a friendly Minion has '''Rage''', summon 2 more.

name: Rabid Prowler
description: '''Sacrifice''': Gain '''Rage''' if you sacrificed at least 1 Slitherbound.

name: Queen's Dragon
description: Summons [[Nyrvir the Fallen]] who breathes spiritfire on the battlefield before she lands.

name: Poison Strike
description: Inflicts '''Poison''' to all enemies in the area.
flavortext: Shower your enemies with the noxious fluids of Akinlep the Tainted today!

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small Scrats.

name: Re-boomer
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay.  As a boomer it explodes on contact or death, but turns back into an egg.

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building.
flavortext: Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.

name: Red Golem
description: Summon a [[Blue Golem]]

name: S.T.INT
description: Fast and cheap ranged Minion.
flavortext: The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - packs quite a punch for its size.  Can't take much in return though.

name: Scott The Sensitive Savage
description: Will '''Cry''' at 50% health.
flavortext: Though a fierce fighter, Scott is also a little emotional. Don't worry though, he'll be ok and back in the fight soon enough!

name: Ravenous Swarmers
description: A few [[Swarmers]], but if the last card you played was a spell, they gain '''Rage''' and '''Haste'''.

name: Rock Rivals
description: '''Taunt'''

name: Ritual of Servitude
description: Summon a random Minion Card with Mana cost equal to the lowest cost card that started in your deck other than this card, including other versions of this card.
flavortext: The bindings of the Slither Lords are not easily broken

name: Resonating Blast Crystal
description: Deal damage in an area and drop a Blast Crystal.

name: Scrat Pack
description: Good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.
flavortext: Scrats are the pest of the arenas, no matter how many you kill there always seem to be more.

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank becomes completely immune to damage and stuns.

name: Shars'Rakk Twins
description: Summon an [[Incubus]], if the last card you played was a 5+ Mana spell, also summon a [[Succubus]]

name: Screaming Scrat
description: '''Rush''', '''Taunt'''
flavortext: Turns out strapping a mine to someones head is one hell of a motivator.

name: Shadow Whelp
description: '''Stealth'''. Deals triple damage when attacking while Stealthed.

name: Shen Stormstrike
description: '''Stuns''' for 2 seconds. If they are already stunned, he instead unleashes a powerful blast.
flavortext: Trough years of meditation, Shen has learned to channel lightning directly into the heart of his foes.

name: Scratillery
description: Fires 5 furry rockets that each summon a [[Scrat Pack|Scrat]] on impact.

name: Sewer Scrat
description: '''Barrel Shield'''
flavortext: Living in the sewers of the great flying city of Bloon has... Side effects.

name: Shen's Shock Stick
description: '''Growthburst Shroom'''

name: Shock Rock
description: '''Stuns''' and damages enemies in an area.

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description: '''Shield'''
flavortext: Still a group of weak ranged units. Still great friends.

name: Shield Totem
description: Summon a Shield Totem that makes the Master's Tower immune to damage as long as its alive.

name: Shieldguard of Light
description: '''Armor of Light''', '''Shield Slam'''.
flavortext: Having an Armor of Light doesn't stop this overly cautious Brother from bringing a shield into battle.

name: Skeleton Horde
flavortext: Skeletons are scrawny fighters, too weak to carry essence, but together they are formindable.

name: Skeletons
description: Summon 3 skeletons

name: Slitherbound
description: Summon 1 [[Slitherbound Lancer]] and 1 [[Slitherbound Darter]] that inflict '''Poison''' for 3 seconds on attack.
flavortext: Slitherbound get to choose their weapon, but not their chain mate.

name: Slithering Summons
description: Summon a [[Living Statue]], [[Prowler]] or [[Soul Stealer]].

name: Smite
description: Deals damage to ground Minions in an area.

name: Skeleton Crew
description: '''Accursed Ascension:''' Summon 3 more Skeletons.

name: Snake Druid
description: '''Call Slitherbound'''

name: Sniper Scrat
description: Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Soul Stealer
description: '''Soul Steal'''
flavortext: Only the most fanatical Slitherbound are granted insight into the cruel arts of the Slither Lords

name: Spiritmancer
description: When attacking an enemy that dies, perform '''Soul Rip'''.

name: Spirit Vessel
description: Gives a random friendly Minion '''Spirit''' on death.

name: Spear Throwers
description: Their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage.

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Gives 3 random friendly Minions '''Spirit''' over 9 seconds.

name: Sniper Squad
description: Very long range, but takes a long time to load.
flavortext: Sometimes less is more, but when it comes to big guns that's definitely not the case!

name: Spawn of Fury
description: '''Stun''' a random friendly minion within the area, reduce its max Health and Damage by 33%, then summon a copy of it.

name: Spirit
description: Give a random friendly Minion '''Spirit'''

name: Stun Blast
description: '''Stuns''' enemies in the area.

name: Stun Lancers
description: Their attacks '''stun''' enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Styxi
description: '''Stealth'''

name: Succubus
description: '''Netherstep''' backwards when damaged by melee attackers.
flavortext: The dark sorceresses of Shars'Rakk are able to step trough the fabric of reality to safety.

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons groups of [[Swarmers]] over time.

name: Sun Burn
description: Give all Minions in a small area '''Rage''' and deal 10 damage 10 times to enemies.

name: Squire Puff
description: Once on the bridge, it gives 3 friendly ground Minions  '''Shield''' every 10 seconds.

name: Stormy
description: Shoots [[Chain Lightning]] at enemies, damaging itself in the process.

name: Sunder
description: Pull a rock from the ground and slam it back down. Deals 75 damage in an area twice. Can only be cast once.

name: Sugilite Shield
description: '''Mana freeze(2)'''

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.
flavortext: Swarmers may be blind, but they'll always smell your fear.

name: Troubadour
description: '''Taunt'''
flavortext: He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly.

name: Undying Skeleton
description: Leaves an '''Undying Corpse''' the first time it dies.

name: Walking Blind Date
description: '''Rush''','''Taunt'''

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: Heals itself when no enemies are near.
flavortext: Not a big fan of monkey business

name: Trick Swap
description: Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and stuns enemies for 4 sec.

name: Tombstone
description: Resurrects the next friendly minion that dies.

name: Tantrum Throwers
description: Summon 2 [[Spear Throwers]]. If you do not control any bridges summon 1 extra. They all gain '''Rage'''

name: Toll of the Dead
description: Summon an [[Undying Skeleton]].

name: Ting, Teng & Tung
description: These brothers count as a single Minion. For every 33% health lost, one of them falls off.

name: Warrior
description: All-round fighter with average health and damage.
flavortext: Always first on the front lines, but never alone for long.

name: Whirly Scrat
description: Deals damage in an area around himself
flavortext: Has a hard time socializing.

name: Wizard Puff
description: If it dies, transform a random enemy Minion or Building into a friendly [[Mana Puff]]!

name: Wall
description: Lots of health, no attack.
flavortext: A perfect distraction for building haters.

name: Xiao Long
description: Every time an opponent casts a spell, Xiao Long gains '''Rage''','''Haste''' and '''Shield'''

name: Wheel Of Doom
description: Hits ALL ground targets in a line 2 times for 150 damage. If something survives both hits, the Wheel breaks.
flavortext: Invented by a madman and infused with magic.

name: Wolf Among Sheep
description: Summon 4 [[Legionnaires]]. One of them gains '''Lycanthropy''' at random.

name: Wreckinator 9000
description: This metal monster will first '''slice and dice''', then '''slam and bam'''. At least until it '''Self-Destruct'''s.
flavortext: Scrat engineering at its finest.

name: Woodsman
description: '''Revelry''': gain '''Rage''' and give nearby enemy Minions '''Slow'''.
flavortext: As a three-time Mountain Games Timber Champion, he will chop trough anything in his path.

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: When summoned, he performs a mighty '''Jump'''
flavortext: The day a Windwalker finds a problem to big to vault is his last.

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flies over the battlefield towards enemy Master Tower and drops bombs every 3 seconds along the way.

name: Zap Shrine
description: '''Stuns'''  the closest enemy for 2 seconds.
flavortext: A thousand lightning strikes have imbued this stone with the ability to zap intruders.

name: Zealots of the Burning Fist
description: Burns 10% of their max health when they attack.
